channel.title: Subtitles problem
channel.description:
Hello every1. Something is wrong with my BMS. I can't see subtitles in the game. Not even in train but also when NPC talks there is no subtitles at all.
I selected in sound options to show subtitles but nothing changed. In steam tried to change language from my own language to english and in other side. Nothing changed.
For now I have installed SDK BASE 2006 and 2007 (auto steam download), dwnlding now Source SDK... pretty heavy files lol. 3gb and 2x 2gb.....
But i cannot find sourcesdk folder in steam folder (my account folder).
Any conclusions? If some1 can help I would be very gr8full.
BTW. I dwnlded torrent file with BMS of this site. I have translation files 4 BMS to use subtitles in my own language.
HELP!:[
EDIT!
Good news folks! i got this, figured it out atlast. Now I have polish subs in game. Gr8.
Now I gonna finish BMS and start orange box<3
Cheers!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
